info.name: 迷路的流星 (262 chars)
info.description:
sphere  smallest 115 chars
像颗找不到路的流星

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
// -31 chars by SnoopethDuckDuck thanks  (from 262 chars)

#define M(g)                                   \
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {           \
        vec2 R = iResolution.xy,               \
             u = abs(fract(5.*U/R.y + .5)-1.); \
        O = texture(iChannel0, U/R);           \
        O.x -= exp(-3e2*min(u.x,u.y));         \
        O = O*.93                              \
          + exp(-g/R.y*length(                 \
        abs(mod(vec2(1.2, 1)*iTime*R.y, R+R) - R) - U));\
}



/*
#define M(g) \
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)\
{\
        vec2  R = iResolution.xy,u=5.*U/min(R.x,R.y)+.5;u=abs(u-ceil(u));\
        float e = min(R.x,R.y);\
        O = texture(iChannel0, U/R);\
        O.x -= exp(-3e2*min(u.x,u.y));\
        O = O*.93+exp(g -50./e*length(  abs( mod( iTime * vec2(.6,.5)*e ,R )*2.-R)  - U));\
}

{\

        O = texture(iChannel0, U/R);\

renderpass.name: Common
